content.en: Power system optimization: Researchers have been investigating how to optimize power systems with FACTS (Flexible AC Transmission Systems) devices. They have used various computational intelligence algorithms, such as Differential Evolution and Genetic Algorithm, to enhance the loadability of power systems, increase the loadability margin of transmission lines, improve system loadability, alleviate line overloads, minimize transmission loss and operating cost, enhance voltage stability, reduce power loss, solve transmission congestion, achieve security constrained optimal power flow, and optimize the placement and sizing of FACTS devices. These algorithms help find the optimal locations, parameter settings, and coordination of FACTS devices, leading to improved power system performance and reduced losses.
content.da: Optimering af kraftsystem: Forskere har undersøgt, hvordan man kan optimere kraftsystemer med FACTS-enheder (Flexible AC Transmission Systems). De har anvendt forskellige beregningsintelligens-algoritmer, såsom Differential Evolution og Genetisk Algoritme, for at forbedre kraftsystemers belastbarhed, øge transmissionslinjers belastbarhedsmargin, forbedre systemets belastbarhed, aflaste linjeoverbelastninger, minimere transmissions- og driftsomkostninger, forbedre spændingsstabiliteten, reducere effektab, løse transmissionsbelastning, opnå sikkerhedsmæssigt betinget optimal kraftstrøm og optimere placering og dimensionering af FACTS-enheder. Disse algoritmer hjælper med at finde de optimale placeringer, parameterindstillinger og koordinering af FACTS-enheder, hvilket fører til forbedret ydelse af kraftsystemer og reduceret tab.
